name: Facebook: Hide Ads, Suggestions, and More
description: Hide some parts of Facebook that I think unimportant, like Ads, friend or group suggestions, home link on the upper right, news ticker, and not-favorited groups/lists/apps. IMPORTANT: "Favorite" your Facebook apps/pages/groups if you don't want them to be hidden on the left column of Facebook. Do it before you activate this style.
additional_info: You can easily add what you want to hide on Facebook: 1. Identify the class/id of that part you want to hide (using "Inspect Element" feature, hover the part and you will see class=" ... " or id=" ... ") 2. add this line to the css code of this style: .classname{display:none} or #idname{display:none} The same simple trick will work on any website, just create your own Stylish! :) changelog: version 0.5: now also hide ads in the timeline version 0.4: hide group member suggestions and group recommendations version 0.3: unhide .tinyman (our photo on the top right of the page) version 0.2: hide friend list suggestions version 0.1 inspired by: this simple yet awesome userstyle
